body_html:
It seems I have got the solution. It's just, abort the version r0.12 and install the version "master", which is r0.11.
Then, replace the line
from tensorflow.models.rnn.ptb import reader
with
import reader
And then comment all the lines containing the "deprecated".
Currently, only in this way can the program run correctly.
I think the reasons may be that the tutorial and the latest version of tensorflow, somehow do not match perfectly. I hope my problem and solution may help a little.
Thank you all for helping me.

body:
It seems I have got the solution. It's just, abort the version r0.12 and install the version "master", which is r0.11. 
Then, replace the line 
`from tensorflow.models.rnn.ptb import reader`
with
`import reader`
And then comment all the lines containing the "deprecated".
Currently, only in this way can the program run correctly.
I think the reasons may be that the tutorial and the latest version of tensorflow, somehow do not match perfectly. I hope my problem and solution may help a little.
Thank you all for helping me.
